game.name: This Game Did Not Delete Itself
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: 2 minutes and 53 seconds. That's how long you need to survive. The only rule is don't look away from the monitor. In this first-person puzzle game, you must figure out how to overcome all the distractions that THEY throw at you. And there will be a lot.
game.shortDescriptionEn: 2 minutes and 53 seconds. That's how long you need to survive. The only rule is don't look away from the monitor. In this first-person puzzle game, you must figure out how to overcome all the distractions that THEY throw at you. And there will be a lot.
